protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1761
text: Frozen leaf tissues (-80°) were crushed by using mortar and pistil; and RNA was extracted with the Plant RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1762
text: Fully expanded leaves from 5 week old plants were collected and pooled. Pools were incubated at 37°C in prewarmed SIB Buffer for 2h.

Then placed in a shaking water bath with 40 oscillations per minute. After treatment, excess of SIB buffer was rinsed off with sterile water; seeds were then blotted dry with filter paper and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1763
protocol.text: The R package gcrma was used to normalize all data from the .cel files. This was done by using the implemented justGCRMA() command.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1764
text: Fully expanded leaves from 5 week old plants were collected and pooled. Pools were incubated at 22°C in prewarmed SIB Buffer for 2h.

Then placed in a shaking water bath with 40 oscillations per minute. After treatment, excess of SIB buffer was rinsed off with sterile water; seeds were then blotted dry with filter paper and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1765
text: Seeds were spread on soil or MS media and kept in the dark at 4-8°C to achieve a uniform germination. 10 DAG (days after germination) seedlings were singled out in individual pots and grown in soil with a light/dark cycle of 16/8 h at 22°C, 60% Relative Humidity (RH) and a light intensity of 5000 lumen m-2. All experiments were carried out with 5 week old plants.
(Parameters: start time = 5, time unit = weeks, min temperature = 22, temperature unit = C, media = Soil)
